# Documentation requirements for abimap
# These are needed to build the documentation

# Core documentation dependencies
sphinx>=6.0.0
sphinx-rtd-theme>=1.2.0

# Additional documentation tools
sphinx-tabs>=3.4.0
sphinxcontrib-httpdomain>=1.7.0

# Security-enhanced requests for external link checking
requests[security]>=2.28.0

# Install package in development mode for documentation
-e .
